actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to exclude students receiving educational assistance from grants from Federal agencies other than the Veterans' Administration in computing the so-called 85-15 rule for purposes of the approval of courses for payment of educational assistance under the GI bill.

summary.text: Excludes from the computation, pursuant to the "85-15" rule, of the percentage of students in a course who are receiving Government educational assistance those students whose fees are paid by Federal agencies other than the Veterans' Administration for purposes of veterans' educational benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to exclude students receiving educational assistance from grants from Federal agencies other than the Veterans' Administration in computing the so-called 85-15 rule for purposes of the approval of courses for payment of educational assistance under the GI bill.
